Entries.summer_5_1: Hi, @!^I'm totally swamped with patients this week and I haven't had time to see Willy about a new fishing lure.^Could you bring me a 'Dressed Spinner?'^   -Paul %item quest 126 true %%
Entries.fall_10_1: This is embarassing, but I just can't stop thinking about Gus' Pepper Poppers.^Will you bring me some?^ -Paul %item quest 127 %%
Entries.winter_5_1: Hello, @!^Have you seen any Broken Glasses lying around?^I've been wanting to fix up a pair but I can't seem to find any.^If you find some, will you send them my way?^ -Paul %item quest 128 %%
Entries.spring 28_1: @!^I'm in desperate need of some Wheat Flour for my sourdough loaf.^Could I borrow some?^ -Paul %item quest 129 %%

Entries.126: ItemDelivery/Gone Fishing/Paul needs a Dressed Spinner to go fishing after work./Bring Paul a Dressed Spinner./Paul 687/-1/1000/-1/true/You're the best, @! I can't wait to get out there and try it out!
Entries.127: ItemDelivery/Something Spicy/Paul is craving something spicy./Bring Paul a some Pepper Poppers./Paul 215/-1/1000/-1/true/YES! Finally! Thanks so much, @!
Entries.128: ItemDelivery/Broken Glasses/Bring Paul wants to fix up some frames./Bring Paul a pair of Broken Glasses./Paul 170/-1/1000/-1/true/These are perfect! Thanks so much, @!
Entries.129: ItemDelivery/A Cup of Flour/Paul needs a cup of flour for his sourdough loaf./Bring Paul some Wheat Flour./Paul 246/-1/5000/-1/true/Now my sourdoigh will be perfect! Thanks, @!

entries.Paul: Did you know that fish still bite when it's raining?#$e#Maybe I can run out to the beach after my next patient.$2
Did you see those bluejays flying overhead? I bet they're after these eggs...$2
entries.Paul_spouse: I know you'll win the egg hunt this year, sweetie!$1

entries.Paul: Wow, now I know where all the birds hang out! It's such a shame they block off these woods during the year.$1
entries.Paul_spouse: I've been waiting to dance with you all year, sweetie!$1

entries.Paul: Look how thick Pierre's glasses look from this angle. I wonder what his prescription is.
entries.Paul_spouse: Do you think anyone would notice if I ran back to the farm to get my fishing rod?$2

entries.Paul: Amazing. I read about these guys in my field journal last week... I wonder what they eat.
entries.Paul_spouse: Year after year, this phenomenon never fails to amaze me!$1

entries.Paul: I know I'm supposed to be enjoying the festival but I can't stop thinking about fishing the river over there.$2
entries.Paul_spouse: I can't wait to see your display! I'm so proud of you, my sweetie.$1

entries.Paul: Do you like candy corn? I can't stand it.$2
entries.Paul_spouse: Next year we should totally come dressed up as a foropter and an occluder.$1

entries.Paul: I can't believe I forgot my fishing rod... of ALL days!$2
entries.Paul_spouse: You've got to win the ice fishing contest this year, sweetie! I made a bet with Willy.$2

entries.Paul: Merry Christmas! I hope your year was as good as mine was!
entries.Paul_spouse: Merry Chirstmas, my sweetie! Oh I love you so.$4

entries.Paul0: I can't believe it's actually happening! You're going to be my wife... how did I get so lucky?$4
entries.Paul1: How would you feel about me hanging a few birdfeeders on the farm?$1

Entries.100112/f Paul 500: sweet/-100 -100/farmer -10000 -10000 0 Pierre 20 11 2 Paul 22 11 3/skippable/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1500/speak Pierre "I don't know how it happened... I can't find my glasses anywhere.$s"/pause 300/speak Paul "It happens to the best of us! You said you're wearing an old backup pair now. What's the vision like?$1"/pause 300/speak Pierre "Blurry. I could barely see my catalogues this morning.$s"/pause 300/speak Paul "Let's go ahead and do a refraction to make sure your prescription is up to date, okay?"/pause 300/move Paul -1 0 3 false/speak Paul "First things first, let's run the autorefractor on you."/pause 600/move Paul 0 1 0 false/move Paul -1 0 0 false/pause 1000/speak Paul "Looking good. Now I'm going to cover your left eye. Read the smallest line of text for me, please."/pause 600/emote Pierre 40/pause 600/speak Paul "Well your prescription has definitely changed. No wonder your backup glasses aren't working for you."/pause 600/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 9 7 1/move farmer 6 0 0 false/move farmer 0 1 0 false/move farmer 7 0 0 false/move farmer 0 2 2 false/jump Pierre/speak Pierre "@! You found my glasses!$1"/pause 1250/speak Paul "Well they're definitely broken.$s"/pause 300/speak Paul "You have two options, Pierre. Either we can fix the broken frames or you could try a brand new pair."/pause 800/speak Pierre "What do you think, @?"/pause 600/emote farmer 40/emote farmer 16/pause 300/emote Pierre 32/speak Pierre "You're right. It's time for a change! I can't wait to see what Caroline thinks of my new look.$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "Well, then! You're all set, Pierre!#$1#Just come on back if your vision seems to change at all and we'll make sure you have an updated prescription."/emote Pierre 32/pause 800/speak Paul "Thanks for coming in, @! You were a big help today.$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 600/end

Entries.100113/f Paul 1000/w sunny/t 630 1900: spring_day_ambient/-100 -100/farmer 34 32 1 Paul 46 31 2/skippable/viewport 46 31 true/pause 1500/move farmer 12 0 0/speak Paul "@! You're just in time.$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "I'm waiting for the rose-hooded parrots. They always fly over the mountain this time of day.$1"/emote farmer 8/pause 600/faceDirection Paul 1/emote Paul 16/speak Paul "Look, here they come!$1"/move farmer -1 0 0 false/move farmer 0 -1 1/playMusic playful/specificTemporarySprite parrots1/pause 800/faceDirection Paul 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 600/playSound parrot/pause 600/playSound parrot/pause 300/faceDirection Paul 3/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 3500/emote farmer 32/pause 300/textAboveHead Paul "Beautiful."/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Paul "I've loved birds for as long as I can remember.$4"pause 300/speak Paul "I used to stand in the backyard for hours holding birdseed.$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "They'd actually land on me, you know. Mom said I had a way with them. I don't know.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak Paul "You should come out here more often, @!$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "You would love birdwatching. It definitely takes your mind off of work and the pressures of life.$2"/pause 300/speak Paul "Oh not that your life is stressful. I mean, I'd love to live on a farm.$1"/pause 300/emote Paul 40/pause 300/speak Paul "Maybe I'll come by some time. I'll bring a bird feeder.$1"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 600/end

Entries.100114/f Paul 1500: playful/-100 -100/farmer 10 19 3 Paul 3 17 0 Evelyn 6 18 3 Harvey -10000 -10000 0 George -10000 -10000 0 Willy -10000 -10000 0/skippable/viewport 3 19 true/pause 1500/move farmer -6 0 3 false/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Paul 1/speak Paul "Hi, @! Glad you could come by.$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "Evelyn's been letting me use her kitchen for the past few weeks. Harvey's is a little small.$2"/pause 300/speak Evelyn "Oh I wouldn't have it any other way!"/pause 300/emote Paul 32/move Evelyn 0 2 2 false/move Evelyn -1 0 3 false/move Evelyn 0 1 3 false/speak Paul "Anyway, I'm making some focaccia today! Want to help me out?$1"/pause 300/emote farmer 16/speak Paul "Awesome! Come measure out three cups of water, will you?$1"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Paul 0/pause 300/playSound clank/pause 100/playSound clank/pause 600/pause 300/playSound clank/pause 300/playSound clank/textAboveHead Paul "Please pass the flour."/pause 800/playSound clank/pause 300/playSound clank/pause 300/playSound clank/pause 1000/emote Paul 20/pause 600/speak Paul "It's perfect!$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "We make a good team, @.$4"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 600/playSound doorClose/warp Harvey 9 24 3/warp George 9 24 3/warp Willy 9 24 3/pause 300/speak Harvey "It smells wonderful in here.$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "I thought I'd invite some friends over help to us eat it.$1"/pause 300/move Harvey 0 -5 3 false/move Harvey -8 0 0 false/move Harvey 0 1 1 false/move George 0 -5 3 false/move George -4 0 3 false/move George 0 1 3 false/move Willy 0 -5 3 false/move Willy -3 0 3 false/move Willy 0 -1 2 false/faceDirection Paul 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 300/speak Paul "Ready to taste it?$1"/pause 300/move Paul 0 2 2 false/move farmer 0 2 2 false/pause 300/emote Paul 32/emote farmer 32/pause 600/end

Entries.100115/f Paul 2000/t 2000 2300: ocean/-100 -100/farmer 12 29 2 Paul 12 39 2 Willy 11 39 2/skippable/viewport 12 39 true/pause 1500/speak Paul "I'm telling you, Willy, the dressed spinner is the way to go this time of year."/pause 600/move farmer 0 7 2/faceDirection Paul 0/faceDirection Willy 0/pause 800/emote Willy 8/speak Willy "This be the boy you told me about, eh?$u^This be the girl you told me about, eh?$u"/pause 300/textAboveHead Paul "Willy..."/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 600/move Willy 0 -1 1 false/speak Willy "Goodnight, you two.$1"/pause 300/move Willy 0 -8 0 false/move farmer 1 0 2 false/move farmer 0 3 2/faceDirection Paul 2/playMusic echos/pause 1000/speak Paul "It's really good to see you, @.$4"/emote Paul 32/pause 600/speak Paul "I always feel at peace here. There's something about the rhythm of the waves and the smell of the air."/pause 300/speak Paul "Sometimes I come out here when I can't sleep.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 300/speak Paul "I don't know... sometimes I have a lot on my mind.$2"/pause 300/emote Paul 60/pause 600/speak Paul "You and the ocean have a similar affect on me.$4"/pause 600/faceDirection Paul 1/speak Paul "There's something about you, @. I'm so glad I met you.$4"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 300/faceDirection Paul 2/speak Paul "What's your family like, @?"/pause 300/emote Paul 40/pause 600/speak Paul "I'm the oldest of eight kids. Sometimes it's hard not to take all of their problems onto myself.$2"/pause 300/speak Paul "I wouldn't trade it for the world, though. I love each of them so much."/pause 300/speak Paul "Sometimes I just need someone to talk to. Thanks for being that someone, @.$2"/pause 300/emote Paul 60/pause 300/emote farmer 20/pause 600/end

I love you to the ends of the earth and back.$4"/pause 1600/specificTemporarySprite parrots1/pause 1600/speak Paul "I don't know if you feel the same way, but I just had to tell you.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 20/pause 300/emote Paul 20/pause 300/specificTemporarySprite parrots1/pause 1600/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/positionOffset Paul 1 0/pause 30/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/end

Entries.100117/f Paul 2500/w sunny/t 600 800: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Paul 64 18 0/pause 600/speak Paul "Morning, @!$1"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/speak Paul "The rose-hooded parrots are migrating over the valley today. It's really amazing and I'd love for you to come!$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "Meet me in the Secret Woods if you're interested. Hope to see you there!$1"/pause 600/end
Entries.100118/f Paul 1500/t 600 800: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Paul 64 18 0/pause 600/speak Paul "Hi, @!$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "I'm just here to invite you to meet me at Evelyn's house sometime! It'd be fun to see more of you.$4"/pause 300/speak Paul "She and George have been letting me bake over there and I thought you might like to join.$1"/pause 300/speak Paul "Come on over if you're interested!"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 600/end
